Subjects: prayers, to Christ; Christ, prayers to

CULLl510.First Lines:
Saluiour suppois my sensualitieSubiect to syn hes maid my saull of
                    sys…
CULLl510.Last Lines:
Substance with honour doing nane supprysffrendis prosperitie heir
                    peax syn heavins blys

CamMagPep2553.First Lines:
Saluiour Suppois my sensualiteSubiect to syn hes maid my saule of
                    sys…
CamMagPep2553.Last Lines:
…Substance with honour doing none suppryisffreyndis prosperite
                    heir peax syne hewynis blys
